channel.title: May be
channel.description:
Okay... I don't really know where to post this so I'm putting it here...
So I have a suggestion for you people. I've seen so many failed attempts at making a rs2006 - 2007 remake.... so why not make a rs 2008 remake. I know it sounds dumb because rs 2008 pretty much sucked, but I believe it would do excellent...

item.title: May be
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:

runewings317:

This would probably go best in General Discussion… And just because you up the date doesn’t mean people are going to complete it. <.<

o.O OHKAY
